review_title: Excellent Organistion to Work With! Headed by  Visionary with strong passion on  giving back to society.
pros:
Covering all areas of Social Development Smile Foundation at Grassroot has proved among the bestest in uplifting underprivilged socities. Adopting new tools of interventions Smile Foundation is one of the fastest growing NFO that has adopted digital Innovations and surpassed Excellence.

Strong Leadership, Excellent Cuture, Firm Values and beliefs stands at the top most among Non Profit Organisations.
cons: Smile Foundation strongly believe in its Vision and Mission.

review_title: An opportunity to bring smiles on a million faces!
pros: Amazing work culture, agile operations, empathetic people, clean & transparent purpose driven organization. Learn more here: www.smilefoundationindia.com
cons: No cons as of now, and hoping there will be none.

review_title: NGO only for name shake... Actually should be branded as a management agency which manages the CSR funds of companies
pros: Nothing good left in organisation
cons: Takes 50%-60% as CSR management fees from companies like Ericson, Hexaware, State bank etc and uses this money to pay heavy salaries to top level management which is not much required if it's aim is social responsibility... But smile has highly paid top level management for managing CSR funds and thus the actual benefit is never transferred to needy and poor society for whom the CSR fund was given.

pros:
Timing
Less work pressure
Day shift
Traveling if u love
Genuine help to needy people
People in management level good and understanding
cons:
Bad politics
Exploitation of human resources by managers and senior managers
Poor salary
Bad appraisal pay
Biased decisions
Poor infrastructure
Delay in releasing appraisal generally October November sometimes December January
ill mannered and baf tempered people mainly middle level management people in programs team
